name: Grace-Shopper
desc: Four week sprint full stack application for users to browse and purchase baked goods and merchandise.
bullPoints: Developed front-end components to create an intuitive user experience using JavaScript and React.
Implemented a relational backend with routes to maintain current inventory using Express, PostgresSQL, and Node.
Collaborated in a team of 4 full-stack developers during a 4 week sprint using agile workflow.

name: Fitnesstrack.r
desc: Two part project creating front-end and back-end for blog site to share exercise routines and activities.
bullPoints: Tested backend using Jest using Jest to create various server API functions and SQL database functions.
Created a front-end to house the database information and adapters using React and built with Vite.

name: Coffee Clicker
bullPoints: Using DOM manipulation to update coffee earned per second and click to represent game progress
